Title: Exempts costs associated with revaluations or reassessments from the tax levy limit on real property
Summary: Exempts cost associated with revaluations or reassessments from the tax levy limit on real property.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to exempting the costs associated with real property revaluation or reassessment for the tax levy limit
